title.text: Security Update for Lync Server 2013 Web Components Server (KB2827754)

description.text: A security issue has been identified in a Microsoft Lync software product that could affect your system. You can help protect your system by installing this update from Microsoft. For a complete listing of the issues that are included in this update, see the associated Microsoft Knowledge Base article. After you install this update, you may have to restart your system.
